typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	LoadDate as timestamp (currentUTC("Berlin"))
}
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		ProductName as string,
		SupplierID as integer,
		CategoryID as integer,
		QuantityPerUnit as string,
		UnitPrice as decimal(19,4),
		UnitsInStock as integer,
		UnitsOnOrder as integer,
		ReorderLevel as integer,
		Discontinued as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> NortwhindProducts
source(output(
		Product_SID as integer,
		LoadDate as timestamp,
		RecordSource as string,
		Product_ID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DVHubProducts
source(output(
		Order_SID as integer,
		Order_ID as integer,
		LoadDate as timestamp,
		RecordSource as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> HubOrders
source(output(
		OrderID as integer,
		ProductID as integer,
		UnitPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Quantity as integer,
		Discount as float
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> OrderDetails
source(output(
		Product_SID as integer,
		LoadDate as timestamp,
		RecordSource as string,
		Product_ID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> HubProduct
source(output(
		Link_Order_Details_SID as integer,
		Product_SID as integer,
		Order_SID as integer,
		LoadDate as timestamp,
		RecordSource as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> LinkOrderDetails
NortwhindProducts, DVHubProducts join(ProductID == Product_ID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinProducts
JoinProducts select(mapColumn(
		ProductName,
		Product_SID,
		LoadDate,
		RecordSource
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSatProduct
HubOrders, OrderDetails join(Order_ID == OrderID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinHubOrdersOnOrderDetails
HubProduct, OrderDetails join(Product_ID == ProductID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinHubProductsOnOrderDetails
JoinHubOrdersOnOrderDetails select(mapColumn(
		Order_SID,
		Order_ID,
		LoadDate,
		RecordSource,
		OrderID,
		ProductID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectAfterJon
SelectAfterJon, JoinHubProductsOnOrderDetails join(SelectAfterJon@ProductID == Product_ID
	&& Order_ID == OrderDetails@OrderID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> AlmostFinalJoin
AlmostFinalJoin, LinkOrderDetails join(HubProduct@Product_SID == LinkOrderDetails@Product_SID
	&& SelectAfterJon@Order_SID == LinkOrderDetails@Order_SID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> FinalJoin
FinalJoin derive(RecordSource = "Northwind",
		LoadDate = $LoadDate) ~> AddRecordSourceLoadDate
SelectSatProduct sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Product_SID as integer,
		ProductName as string,
		LoadDate as timestamp,
		RecordSource as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Product_SID,
		ProductName,
		LoadDate,
		RecordSource
	)) ~> DVSatProducts
AddRecordSourceLoadDate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Link_Order_Details_SID as integer,
		Quantity as integer,
		UnitPrice as decimal(5,2),
		LoadDate as timestamp,
		RecordSource as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Link_Order_Details_SID,
		Quantity,
		UnitPrice
	)) ~> DVSatelliteOrderDetails
